intro: Caladium bicolor var. haematostigma, commonly known as the Red-veined Dieffenbachia, is a tropical plant native to South America. It is characterized by its striking, heart-shaped leaves with deep red veins against a dark green background. The plant thrives in warm, humid environments and requires indirect sunlight for optimal growth. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its vibrant foliage. Caladium bicolor var. haematostigma is relatively low maintenance but benefits from regular watering and well-draining soil.
